comment: /**  * Returns the path to which endpoints should be mapped.  * @return the path  */
code: /**  * Returns the path to which endpoints should be mapped.  * @return the path  */ public String getPath() {     return this.path. }
public String createSubPath(String path) {     return this.path + normalizePath(path). }

private static String normalizePath(String path) {     if (!StringUtils.hasText(path)) {         return path.     }     String normalizedPath = path.     if (!normalizedPath.startsWith("/")) {         normalizedPath = "/" + normalizedPath.     }     if (normalizedPath.endsWith("/")) {         normalizedPath = normalizedPath.substring(0, normalizedPath.length() - 1).     }     return normalizedPath. }
